# isSupported

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether a device supports the barcode detection provider.

## Declaration

```swift
static var isSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Type properties

- **requiredAuthorizations**: The authorization types you need to use the barcode detection provider.

items.description: The authorization types you need to use the barcode detection provider.
